channel.title: rawsanj on Coding Cloud
channel.description: Recent content in rawsanj on Coding Cloud

item.description: I’m a Full-Stack Cloud Developer at Capgemini. My interests include Microservices, Serverless Architecture, Containers and I love building cool software and system using languages like Java, Kotlin, Node.js. I am an AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional and I’ve completed the Pivotal Platform Acceleration Labs program. In this space, I intend to share my Github projects, knowledge and experience about cloud-native things I’ve learned.
